评论详情: The Y2K-inspired design is so fun and fashionable—these pants give off a cool, streetwear vibe that instantly elevates any outfit. The baggy fit and wide-leg cut are so on-trend right now, and I love how comfortable they are. They have just the right amount of slouch without being too overwhelming.

评论概述: nice Y2K-KPop look but swishy material
评论详情: Sounds & feels more like 100% nylon than the polyamide fabric it's supposed to be, according to its Amazon product description. Like swishy basketball athlete pants. It's saved by the cute pink bows with the narrow pink lining on its sides. Or my daughter would've nixed this due to its swishy & not the most comfortable material. Fit was great on her. Got her the Medium for her 5'5 pear-shaped figure that fits a size M-L or 10-12. Hem was perfect on her.  Moderately recommended.
So pretty in person!! Exactly as pictured!!
